metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10203 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: PowerDNS Authoritative daemon , pdns versions 4.0.x before 4.0.9, 4.1.xbefore 4.1.11, exiting when encountering a serial between 2^31 and 2^32-1while trying to notify a slave leads to DoS.

criterions.comment: pdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
